00044

00049 
00057   namespace APE {
00058 
00060 
00068     class TAGLIB_EXPORT File : public TagLib::File
00069     {
00070     public:
00075       enum TagTypes {
00077         NoTags  = 0x0000,
00079         ID3v1   = 0x0001,
00081         APE     = 0x0002,
00083         AllTags = 0xffff
00084       };
00085 
00091       File(FileName file, bool readProperties = true,
00092            Properties::ReadStyle propertiesStyle = Properties::Average);
00093 
00099       File(IOStream *stream, bool readProperties = true,
00100            Properties::ReadStyle propertiesStyle = Properties::Average);
00101 
00105       virtual ~File();
00106 
00111       virtual TagLib::Tag *tag() const;
00112 
00118       PropertyMap properties() const;
00119 
00124       void removeUnsupportedProperties(const StringList &properties);
00125 
00131       PropertyMap setProperties(const PropertyMap &);
00136       virtual Properties *audioProperties() const;
00137 
00144       virtual bool save();
00145 
00158       ID3v1::Tag *ID3v1Tag(bool create = false);
00159 
00171       APE::Tag *APETag(bool create = false);
00172 
00181       void strip(int tags = AllTags);
00182 
00183     private:
00184       File(const File &);
00185       File &operator=(const File &);
00186 
00187       void read(bool readProperties, Properties::ReadStyle propertiesStyle);
00188       void scan();
00189       long findID3v1();
00190       long findAPE();
00191 
00192       class FilePrivate;
00193       FilePrivate *d;
00194     };
00195   }
00196 }
